#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int total=0;
        while(s.size()!=0)
        {
            char c=s[0];
            for(int j=1;j<s.size();j++)
            {
                if(s[j]==c){
                    s.erase(j,1);
                    //total=total+1;
                break;
                }
            }
            s.erase(0,1);
            total=total+1;
        }
        cout<<total<<endl;

    }
}
